proposal: Hey Battle Infinity, congrats on reaching 14989 holders! Your gaming platform is creating a unique Metaverse where players can not only battle but also experience an immersive world. We can help expand your ecosystem with tools like a custom DEX, lottery, and more. Imagine an IBAT-based lottery or a DEX that enhances Battle Swap. All these tools are B2B, so you're not just playing, you're creating. See my profile for demo and details.
